channel.title: Nemesis:::::Re-Written:::::50+ updates!
channel.description:
Yup, since I had no help AT ALL with my errors, I couldn't fix it, so I decided to keep working on my special server. Check out pics: DHALLY IS WAY TO SLOW, so I can't catch both hits, because it lags a little bit too.
DDS Spec: [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img74.imageshack.us/img74/9620/doublespec1fn7.png[/img][/URL]
Maul Spec: [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img225.imageshack.us/img225/2827/doublespec2jj2.png[/img][/URL]
1. Selected NEW starting source 2. Added forums. (Won't post unless I get permission) 3. Full Specials 4. Double Damage -DDS spec! 5. Almost all skills work, including: Attack Strength Defence Range Prayer Magic Runecrafting Hitpoints Agility Thieving Crafting Fletching Smithing Fishing Cooking Firemaking Slayer-Horrible, just kill NPC's, no missions or anything
6. Added the best welcome screen possible. 7. ELEMENTAL ROBES 8. FULL Edgeville 9. FULL Fally 10. FULL Catherby (MUST FISH OWN FOOD!) 11. Figher Torso Minigame 12. Dark Bow (1/3 chance of doing double dmg, special always does double +extra dmg!) 13. Almost FULL fishing! (You can fish without the items to fish with though, like a harpoon etc.) 14. Almost NO lag! 15. Double Maul special! 16. Double Dragon Hally special! 17. New client 18. Better background 19. SKULLING!!! 20. Need to use client, or you can't see text, damage, or your HP, and of course, the skulls! 21. Fixed "Female Bug" 22. User Profiles 23. Fixed Med Helms and Cloaks 24. Removed EXP from any object 25. EXTREMELY challenging training, 55 EXP per hit. I.E, you hit a 10, you get 550 exp. 26. Train at Slayer Tower as a beginner, Crawling Hands hit a max of 3. 27. ::Jad to get to him. (Portal wasn't working). 28. Added NPC hitting, so they hit randomly between their max 29. Jad-IMPOSSIBLE to SOLO, need at least 3-4 people on him. 30. Jad's hit ranges from 40-91, and he always hits above 40, never seen anything under. 31. Fixed a lot of weapon bonuses 32. Added in CORRECT Bronze-Barrows gloves 33. Killing the monsters in the Slayer Tower gives 80 Slayer EXP per hit. 34. Need 85 Slayer to get to Abyssal Demons 35. Abyssal Demons RARELY drop a whip, 1/20 chance, and hit up to 40. 36. Removed Elemental Robes-EXTREMELY GAY 37. Removed about 280 KB of un-needed NPCs.. 38. Removed all training commands 39. Removed all commands 40. Noclip totally fucks your account, credits to Legend! 41. When you use cat, it doesn't spawn a cat, it flags your account into a folder with your name and offense 42. When you mass click, it flags your account into a folder with your name and offense 43. Added an animation for DDS special. *Needs tested* 44. Added requirements to monsters for Slayer 45. From 1-15 Slayer, kill Crawling Hands 46. 15-?? (need to finish it) kill Banshees 47. Need to add a new place with lvl 30-85 Slayer monsters lol. 48. Added in FULL Slayer Tower 49. Finished lvls 15-30 on the bottom floor 50. Added in full requirements for Slayer 51. If you attack a NPC, without required Slayer, you get an error, and it sends you a message. 52. KBD has a 1/50 chance for Dmed and other various rune items 53. KQ has a 1/100+ chance of dropping a Chain, 2H, or Med 54. Greater Demon HARDLY drops Dlong, Dscimmy, or med 55. Lesser Demon drops nothing 56. All other dragons drop pretty much nothing 57. Best item available in the stores is rune, need to get a better economy 58. Deleted Dragon Shop 59. Deleted God Store 60. Lowered the EXP rate (now stands at 90) 61. Added in working Slayer-(I didn't have time to test, it should work) 62. Noclip does the following:Resets your bank, -500M exp to all skills, saves stats, and disconnects you. 63. Cat does the following:Flags your account into a folder of mine 64. Massing does the following:Flags your account into a folder of mine 65. Re-added pass encryption (If you can't remember your own password, your own damn fault) 66. Added in Guthan Set effect, random chance of healing 67. Made all barrows drops 1/20+ chance 68. Jad officially is unable to solo, he has like 300 HP, and is always hitting a 50+, good luck! 69. Finally port-forwarded 70. No-IP needs to be tested 71. Client is 100% done, blue skulling with a white square (I'll have better ones in the future) 72. Reduced some lag 73. Took out over 200KB again out of my client.java, of un needed material
Update Log: June 29-July 1-20 updates July 4-53 updates-I need a life.. buying life 500k pl0x.. ;)

item.title: Nemesis:::::Re-Written:::::50+ updates!
item.dc:creator: @Fr33b1e Fr33b1e
item.description:
@Fr33b1e wrote:

Gtfo of my thread. If you just come here to flame me, just leave. I don’t care how good at coding you are, you have no right to make fun of my accomplishments. I’m proud of them, and that’s all that matters, and the bars fills, unfills, highlights, etc, and I don’t have GFX for the DDS spec yet because I just added them in, I didn’t bother with it.

Read full topic

item.title: Nemesis:::::Re-Written:::::50+ updates!
item.dc:creator: @getsome getsome
item.description:
@getsome wrote:

OK so the only thing u have is double hitting specs ? GREAT ok peeps heres how to make double hitting
change the pkdelay to 2 allong whit weapondelay make it so it changes when u click a button (activate the bar)

sexy?? nothing sexy at all sorry but dont try to make it sound hard and allot of work when its not. also i do think u should learn how to make gfx strike at the npcs direction and not after or beside it.

and if u want that skull to be transparant post ithere and il make it transparant for u

Read full topic

@Fr33b1e wrote:

Would you want to help? I’m also working on getting my Prayer Icons back on. I’ll give credits to the person who helps me get a transparent sprite for a skull. But I won’t be sending you my source or client, that’s just bullshit if you ask me.

EDIT:I’m a Notepad++ user too… >.>

item.title: Nemesis:::::Re-Written:::::50+ updates!
item.dc:creator: @Fr33b1e Fr33b1e
item.description:
@Fr33b1e wrote:

Yup, since I had no help AT ALL with my errors, I couldn’t fix it, so I decided to keep working on my special server.
Check out pics: DHALLY IS WAY TO SLOW, so I can’t catch both hits, because it lags a little bit too.

DDS Spec:

Maul Spec:

  1. Selected NEW starting source

  2. Added forums. (Won’t post unless I get permission)

  3. Full Specials

  4. Double Damage -DDS spec!

  5. Almost all skills work, including:
    Attack
    Strength
    Defence
    Range
    Prayer
    Magic
    Runecrafting
    Hitpoints
    Agility
    Thieving
    Crafting
    Fletching
    Smithing
    Fishing
    Cooking
    Firemaking
    Slayer-Horrible, just kill NPC’s, no missions or anything

  6. Added the best welcome screen possible.

  7. ELEMENTAL ROBES

  8. FULL Edgeville

  9. FULL Fally

  10. FULL Catherby (MUST FISH OWN FOOD!)

  11. Figher Torso Minigame

  12. Dark Bow (1/3 chance of doing double dmg, special always does double +extra dmg!)

  13. Almost FULL fishing! (You can fish without the items to fish with though, like a harpoon etc.)

  14. Almost NO lag!

  15. Double Maul special!

  16. Double Dragon Hally special!

  17. New client

  18. Better background

  19. SKULLING!!!

  20. Need to use client, or you can’t see text, damage, or your HP, and of course, the skulls!

  21. Fixed “Female Bug”

  22. User Profiles

  23. Fixed Med Helms and Cloaks

  24. Removed EXP from any object

  25. EXTREMELY challenging training, 55 EXP per hit. I.E, you hit a 10, you get 550 exp.

  26. Train at Slayer Tower as a beginner, Crawling Hands hit a max of 3.

  27. ::Jad to get to him. (Portal wasn’t working).

  28. Added NPC hitting, so they hit randomly between their max

  29. Jad-IMPOSSIBLE to SOLO, need at least 3-4 people on him.

  30. Jad’s hit ranges from 40-91, and he always hits above 40, never seen anything under.

  31. Fixed a lot of weapon bonuses

  32. Added in CORRECT Bronze-Barrows gloves

  33. Killing the monsters in the Slayer Tower gives 80 Slayer EXP per hit.

  34. Need 85 Slayer to get to Abyssal Demons

  35. Abyssal Demons RARELY drop a whip, 1/20 chance, and hit up to 40.

  36. Removed Elemental Robes-EXTREMELY GAY

  37. Removed about 280 KB of un-needed NPCs…

  38. Removed all training commands

  39. Removed all commands

  40. Noclip totally fucks your account, credits to Legend!

  41. When you use cat, it doesn’t spawn a cat, it flags your account into a folder with your name and offense

  42. When you mass click, it flags your account into a folder with your name and offense

  43. Added an animation for DDS special. Needs tested

  44. Added requirements to monsters for Slayer

  45. From 1-15 Slayer, kill Crawling Hands

  46. 15-?? (need to finish it) kill Banshees

  47. Need to add a new place with lvl 30-85 Slayer monsters lol.

  48. Added in FULL Slayer Tower

  49. Finished lvls 15-30 on the bottom floor

  50. Added in full requirements for Slayer

  51. If you attack a NPC, without required Slayer, you get an error, and it sends you a message.

  52. KBD has a 1/50 chance for Dmed and other various rune items

  53. KQ has a 1/100+ chance of dropping a Chain, 2H, or Med

  54. Greater Demon HARDLY drops Dlong, Dscimmy, or med

  55. Lesser Demon drops nothing

  56. All other dragons drop pretty much nothing

  57. Best item available in the stores is rune, need to get a better economy

  58. Deleted Dragon Shop

  59. Deleted God Store

  60. Lowered the EXP rate (now stands at 90)

  61. Added in working Slayer-(I didn’t have time to test, it should work)

  62. Noclip does the following:Resets your bank, -500M exp to all skills, saves stats, and disconnects you.

  63. Cat does the following:Flags your account into a folder of mine

  64. Massing does the following:Flags your account into a folder of mine

  65. Re-added pass encryption (If you can’t remember your own password, your own damn fault)

  66. Added in Guthan Set effect, random chance of healing

  67. Made all barrows drops 1/20+ chance

  68. Jad officially is unable to solo, he has like 300 HP, and is always hitting a 50+, good luck!

  69. Finally port-forwarded

  70. No-IP needs to be tested

  71. Client is 100% done, blue skulling with a white square (I’ll have better ones in the future)

  72. Reduced some lag

  73. Took out over 200KB again out of my client.java, of un needed material

Update Log:
June 29-July 1-20 updates
July 4-53 updates-I need a life… buying life 500k pl0x…
